column5: Entire Guest House. Private suite with it's own beautiful bathroom and it's own washer/dryer in the closet. Huge shower, no tub. Large LED TV on wall, wifi. Desk. Large closet with your own stacked washer/dryer. Courtyard view. NO PETS of any size, NO SMOKING ANYWHERE ON PROPERTY. No visitors unless it's your spouse or children. New kitchen! Living room is set up with Theatre Chairs and TV.
column8: 15 min to Airport, Guest House w/Washer/Dryer
